video.title: El Chapo
video.synopsis: This drama series chronicles the true story of the rise, capture and escape of notorious Mexican drug lord Joaquín "El Chapo" Guzmán.

episodes.synopsis: El Chapo must fulfill his promise to Pablo Escobar of moving cocaine across the border under a shortened timeline, or pay the price.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Chapo desires to achieve patron status and feels disrespected as he tries to collaborate with drug lords. Miguel Ángel must make a decision.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The Mexican government recruits Amado to help control the escalating violence. The Avendaño brothers cross a line.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Ramón brings in a group of sicarios in a hunt for El Chapo. A mass shooting at an airport arouses suspicion and a prominent cardinal dies.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: The government offers a reward for the capture of El Chapo, and he is forced to go into hiding while making plans to flee the country.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Don Sol feeds information to Gabriela as she looks for a victim to go on the record against Gen. Blanco. Chapo meets with a drug lord in Guatemala.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Don Sol continues to work his way up the political ladder and interrogates El Chapo, who offers him information in exchange for a deal.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Violence surrounds Gen. Blanco. El Chapo tries to acclimate to life in prison but gets a rude awakening when he tries to bribe a guard.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: El Chapo reflects on his childhood and how he entered the drug business. His punishments in prison become more severe.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Two years after his arrest, El Chapo is transferred to a lax prison, where he promises Don Sol he'll get rid of the Avendaños in exchange for freedom.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: El Chapo sets in motion an elaborate plan to escape from prison. A new Mexican president delivers a blow to Don Sol, who scrambles to recover.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: A bug planted in his son's car reveals El Chapo's location to special forces. To lure Ramón Avendaño into an ambush, El Chapo coerces one of his men.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When Raciel refuses to join the federation, El Chapo enlists the Federales and army to arrest him and battle the Gulf Cartel militia for its turf.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: After Chente settles a painful score with him, El Chapo carefully chooses a reaction that earns him another ally in his war against the Gulf Cartel.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: When an anti-corruption presidential candidate becomes the 2006 front-runner, Don Sol makes a deal with his opponent. A teen catches El Chapo's eye.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: With the arms and troops given to him by the new Mexican president to conquer the Gulf Cartel, El Chapo decides to kill two birds with one stone.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Teens and young adults are kidnapped in Nuevo Laredo and forced to work for the warring cartels. A mother travels to Culiacán to search for her child.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Risking his life, Arturo meets with Chente and El Cano to negotiate peace. When Quino is arrested, El Chapo commits a betrayal to get his son released.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: El Chapo's son El Moreno finally gets a chance to prove himself in the business, but he ignores an important instruction from his father.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: El Chapo's enemies take advantage of his time of grief. Arturo becomes paranoid and consults a fortuneteller to determine who he can and cannot trust.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Back in Culiacán with renewed resolve, El Chapo sets out to eliminate his enemies one by one. Don Sol gets a dream offer, but with a strict condition.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: The DEA is alarmed by the expansive growth of El Chapo's drug empire. Don Sol forges a new alliance to further his career.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: El Chapo is thrilled about his Forbes list placement until a betrayal brings down one of his best men. Don Sol finds himself in a new relationship.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Don Sol tells El Chapo about his new alliance. The DEA hunt continues and public pressure mounts for an investigation into Mayel's claims.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Berta and Don Sol each try in their own way to deal with their latest problem. Elba shares exciting news with El Chapo as the authorities close in.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: El Chapo tries to keep his promise to Elba, but when Graciela is compromised, he informs her of his new plan. Mexico votes for its new president.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Gov. Jorge del Toro is linked to the Sinaloa Cartel and the DEA puts pressure on Esteban Prieto and Don Sol to capture El Chapo.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: With the Mexican government turned against him, El Chapo gets cornered in Mazatlán. Berta becomes suspicious of Don Sol's love life.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: An isolated El Chapo tries to build a friendship with a guard. Berta and Don Sol worry about their futures as a political scandal affects Prieto.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: With El Chapo incarcerated, a power struggle occurs between Quino and Dámaso, with each man insisting he's the one in charge of the Sinaloa Cartel.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: After seeing an interview in which a famous actress speaks favorably about him, El Chapo demands a meeting. Meanwhile, tunnel construction continues.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: The world reacts to El Chapo's escape. The drug kingpin reveals his successor and tells his men to stop fighting. Berta gets angry at Don Sol.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: El Chapo tells Vanessa how he thinks his Hollywood film should end. Don Sol investigates his wife to find something he can use to keep her in line.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Gunfights ensue as El Chapo tries desperately to avoid being captured and extradited. Don Sol's ambitions drive him to a dark place.
episodes.title: Episode 13
